title: Stash
text: The Hideout's official Escape from Tarkov Discord bot

title: Battle Buddy
text: The unofficial Escape from Tarkov companion app, brought to you by Veritas with help from his community, is just what every PMC needs by their side before, during, and after their raids!

title: Database app for Tarkov
text: Database app for Tarkov with feature: The Flea Market, Quest Tracker, Items to Keep for Quest/Hideout, Ballistics, Craft Profit Calculator, Barter Save Calculator, Map

title: eft-ammo
text: Always up to date Ammo and Armor Charts. Data provided by NoFoodAfterMidnight.

title: eft-graph
text: eft-graph helps you make the most of Tarkov's Hideout feature. Explore requirements & track your progress as you build your Hideout!

title: Rat Scanner
text: Rat Scanner allows you to scan items and provides you with realtime data about them. Items can be scanned instantly at any time!

title: Tarkov Guru
text: Look up item prices, barter costs, and hideout craft profit. Set your hideout and trader progress to see only the barters and crafts that are available to you. Discord bot for quick lookup of item prices.

title: Tarkov Roulette
text: Tarkov Roulette is a tool that creates random loadouts and challenges for you and your squad

title: The Hideout
text: Invaluable sidekick during your Escape from Tarkov adventures. Available on the Google Play Store.

title: Totov Builder
text: Totov Builder helps you create your weapon builds, choose your PMC equipment and easily visualize the price, weight and stats of your entire loadout. Manage your budget efficiently by tracing every ruble you put into your loadouts.

title: Errbot
text: An all purpose Discord chatbot that integrates with Escape from Tarkov

title: TarkovItemBot
text: Also known as Tarkov Handbook Discord Bot. A Discord bot providing various statistics and calculations for the game Escape from Tarkov
